name: Sheltered Deep
description:
In a world torn apart by war, many sought refuge in the depths.
Sheltered Deep is a psychological horror game about desperation, cruelty and thin lines between right and wrong.
Will your choices be your salvation, or will they doom your soul for eternity?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam

Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Created by: 

@ThorGameDev , @Jonrei and @Anchry
